thread.title: Brazil's Petrobras to publish results on August 6
thread.title_full: Brazil's Petrobras to publish results on August 6

title: Brazil's Petrobras to publish results on August 6
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Thu, Jul 2, 2015, 22:56 BST - UK Markets closed Brazil's Petrobras to publish results on August 6 Reuters – 21 minutes ago 12.30 +0.12 
RIO DE JANEIRO (Reuters) - Brazil's state-run oil company Petrobras (PETR4.SA) said on Thursday it plans to publish second quarter results on Aug. 6. 
The company has been forced to delay the publication of previous quarterly results due to a massive corruption scandal at the firm. 
(Reporting by Stephen Eisenhammer; Editing by Chris Reese) Tax cuts, pensions, childcare, online accounts and beer duty, here's … Related Stock Articles Follow the quotes you care about most.
